name: Pinnacle Treatment Centers Nj Iii LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Pinnacle Treatment Centers Nj Iii LLC is a Clinic/Center, Recovery Care provider based in Pennsville, NJ. From 2022-02 through 2023-05, this provider received $279K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 95% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: G2067 (G2067). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2023-05, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
